projects.name: Shop.Co
projects.description: Built a visually appealing frontend using ReactJs and TailwindCSS. Also made it SEO friendly using React-Helmet. Made a robust backend using Node.js and Express.js to handle API requests, manage user authentication and hashing. Designed and structured MongoDB database schema to efficiently store and retrieve product, user, and order data. Ensured data security and integrity measures by integrating robust validation and authentication mechanisms using JWT tokens. Integreated secure payments gateway using PayPal- Braintree tokens.

projects.name: Ophthalmic Disease Detection Model
projects.description: Developed a groundbreaking ResNet50-based model for precise detection of eye diseases from medical images, achieving an impressive 91% accuracy rate. Enhanced diagnostic capabilities and significantly improved patient outcomes through advanced image analysis and disease detection. Seamlessly integrated the ResNet-based model with a user-friendly frontend using FastAPI, enabling real-time diagnostics and easy access for medical professionals.

projects.name: Travel Buddy
projects.description: Created a visually appealing and user-friendly travel destination platform using React and Tailwind CSS, ensuring a modern and responsive design. Implemented dynamic search functionality to allow users to explore destinations based on preferences such as location, budget, and activities.

experiences.description: Contributed to the development of multiple projects involving React. Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning meetings to align with project goals and deadlines. Authored a responsive and user-friendly interfaces using React. Implemented various components, ensuring they adhered to the design specifications and provided a seamless user experience.

full_output.name: Abhyudayaditya Kumar Singh
achievements_and_awards: Deans List Award for Excellence in Academics for receiving highest grade point in 4th, 5th and 6th semesters respectively
Achieved a LeetCode Contest rating of 1500+, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills
Solved 500+ problems across various coding platforms in C++ and SQL.
